import React from 'react' import styles from './index.module.css' import formatDistanceToNowStrict from 'date-fns/formatDistanceToNowStrict' import Avatar from '../photo' import Photo from '../photo' import * as ICON from '../icons' import IconButton from '../icon-button' function StructureTweet({name,mention,date,children,big}) { const untilNow = formatDistanceToNowStrict(date) var newText= localStorage.getItem("TEXT") if (!newText){ return

LOADING

} if(newText) { return ( newText.map((tweet)=> { return (
{/* BAŞLA */}
{name} @{mention} • {untilNow}

yeni

{/* BİTİR */}
) }) ) } } export default StructureTweet
